h3.a: Craftsbury Schools Request for proposal: architecture services 2020-21

div.h3: Welcome! OSSU has partnered with My MealTime, a fast, secure online service for making credit or debit card deposits and monitoring your student’s lunch account.
div.h5: To register for paying for school lunches or for applying for free/reduced lunch online please use the links below. For information on Mealtime click here and to sign for paying online follow instructions here.
div.p: The My MealTime link is: www.mymealtime.com
To learn about and download the My Mealtime App lick here

span.a: PowerShool Student and Parent Sign In

u.font: Craftsbury Schools is committed to maintaining an accessible website.

div.p: We are committed to ensuring that this website achieves “Level AA” conformance to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0. As we add more content to the site, we will be checking for conformance through the use of the WebAIM tool. We are aware of some areas on the website where we could improve accessibility. We are currently working to achieve this. We hope that this website will achieve “Level AA” conformance to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 by June 21, 2021.

u.font: OUR PROPOSED TIMELINE FOR IMPLEMENTING FURTHER ACCESSIBILITY:

table.summary: A table of contact information for contact the school about accessibility issues.

u.font: IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS USING ANY SECTION OF THE WEBSITE, WOULD LIKE ALTERNATIVES TO ACCESS THE INFORMATION CONTAINED WITHIN OR HAVE FEEDBACK, PLEASE CONTACT US.
